description: You have a project due on Monday afternoon, but your peers have invited you to attend a party with them. How willÂ you prioritize work or schedule time for unwinding? .

choices.text: Attend the party and work on the project later.
Skip the party and focus on the project.
Work on the project for a few hours, then attend the party.

description: A group project is closing to the deadline. The workload of each teammate is uneven and a meeting is suggested for reallocate tasks. How do you handle the situation?

choices.text: Take on more tasks to help the team meet the deadline.
Suggest redistributing tasks based on each member's availability.
Focus on your assigned tasks and let others manage their workload.

description: You are invited to a networking event after work.

choices.text: Attend the event to make connections.
Skip the event to relax at home.
Use the time to work on a side project.

description: Your manager asks you to mentor a new employee.

choices.text: Agree to mentor them.
Politely decline due to your workload.
Suggest someone else for the role.

description: You have an important presentation tomorrow.

choices.text: Spend the evening preparing for it.
Relax and trust your existing knowledge.
Ask a colleague for advice and tips.

description: Your friend invites you to a weekend getaway.

choices.text: Join them for the getaway.
Stay home to catch up on work.
Compromise and go for one day.

description: You are feeling burnt out from work.

choices.text: Take a day off to recharge.
Push through and keep working.
Talk to your manager about your workload.

description: A colleague asks for your help with their project.

choices.text: Help them even if it delays your work.
Politely decline to focus on your tasks.
Offer advice but don't get directly involved.

description: You have the opportunity to attend a professional workshop.

choices.text: Attend the workshop to learn new skills.
Skip it to focus on current tasks.
Ask your manager if it's worth attending.

description: Your company is hosting a volunteer day.

choices.text: Participate in the volunteer activities.
Use the time to catch up on work.
Skip it and take a personal day.
